text.div:
Viral Hemorrhagic Fever (Tests for Viral Hemorrhagic Fever Virus Nucleic Acid)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    41621-4 Arenavirus RNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    41636-2 Ebola virus RNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    41638-8 Marburg virus RNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    75411-9 Ebola Zaire virus RNA [Presence] in Plasma or Blood by NAA with probe detection
    86518-8 Ebola virus RNA [Presence] in Blood by NAA with probe detection
    86574-1 Marburg virus RNA [Presence] in Blood by NAA with probe detection
    88192-0 Crimean-Congo hemorrhagic fever virus RNA [Presence] in Serum by NAA with probe detection
